description:
OWASP Dorset Chapter is proud to present our annual CTF event, for 2022 we shall be hosting a tournament on TryHackMe: King of the Hill.

Although the event is online, as this is a live participatory event it will not be recorded. We will have some prizes to hand out for winners of the tournament.

"King of the Hill (KoTH) is a competitive hacking game, where you play against 10 other hackers to compromise a machine and then patch its vulnerabilities to stop other players from also gaining access. The longer you maintain your access, the more points you get."

In order to take part, you will need to have a TryHackMe account, no subscription required.

For a full list of event pre-requisites, take a look at the OWASP Dorset website: [https://owasp.org/www-chapter-dorset/#div-kingofthehill](https://owasp.org/www-chapter-dorset/#div-kingofthehill)
We look forward to seeing you all there!
title: TryHackMe: King of the Hill tournament
